contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include increased intracranial pressure with any or all of persistent throbbing headache confusion and moderate fever Vertigo Palpitations Visual disturbances Nausea and vomiting possibly with colic and even bloody diarrhea Syncope especially in the upright posture Air hunger and dyspnea later followed by reduced ventilatory effort Diaphoresis with the skin either flushed or cold and clammy Heart block and bradycardia Paralysis Coma Seizures Death
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Erythrityl Tetranitrate is a vasodilator with general properties similar to nitroglycerin

incompatibilities.description: Dapoxetine may increase the orthostatic hypotensive and hypotensive activities of Erythrityl tetranitrate
Erythrityl tetranitrate may increase the hypotensive activities of Riociguat
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Erythrityl tetranitrate is combined with Rosiglitazone
Molsidomine may increase the hypotensive activities of Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Milrinone is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Pentoxifylline is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Tadalafil is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Vardenafil is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Dipyridamole is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Ibudilast is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Avanafil is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Udenafil is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Doxofylline is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Mirodenafil is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Fostamatinib is combined with Erythrityl tetranitrate
Ethanol may increase the hypotensive and vasodilatory activities of Erythrityl tetranitrate
The therapeutic efficacy of Erythrityl tetranitrate can be decreased when used in combination with Patent Blue
The risk or severity of hypotension can be increased when Erythrityl tetranitrate is combined with Sildenafil
Erythrityl tetranitrate may increase the vasodilatory activities of Isosorbide mononitrate
